input.sentences: this is a picture of a young girl .
this is a picture of a mexican plate .
this is a picture of a beach .
this is a picture of three people .
two friends are sitting on a bench .
output.sentences: The girl smiled adamantly as she prepared to eat her large meal.
The steaming hot enchilada bore a delicious smell.
After eating the beach was the perfect place to enjoy the day.
The girl walked on with her sister and father as they enjoyed the beach.
Later the girl and her sister talked about the day at the beach.
